name: SpacColor
description:
SpacColor

As a captain of your own spaceship you will have to battle the enemies of the SpacColor space unit. 

Fly, dodge and destroy those ships to survive in the atmosphere of space.

Let you be hit by the bullets, ships to be able to go and destroy the enemies ship. Only ships with the same color can hit eachother and can so be destroyed.

This is game is in development, a prototype to see if the game is "fun" to play. 

(Updates will come)

Controls

  • WASD | Arrow Keys: move the ship
  • Shift: Boost your ships speed
  • Left click: Shoot | Menu navigation
  • Mouse: Aim | Menu navigation
  • Esc: Pauze menu
  • Ships with the same color can only hit eachother
